testcase.purpose: Check if WRT supports W3C DOM onerror event for video lable.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Web Application Runtime
testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a response when the request is a [HTTP] GET request.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Web Application Runtime
testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a [HTTP] 501 Not Implemented response when the request is a synchronous [HTTP] GET request.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Web Application Runtime
testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a [HTTP] 501 Not Implemented response when the request is a [HTTP] HEAD request.

testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a [HTTP] 501 Not Implemented response when the request is a synchronous [HTTP] HEAD request.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Web Application Runtime
testcase.purpose: Check if WRT throws an exception when the request is an invalid request.

testcase.component: Tizen WRT Core Spec/Web Application Runtime
testcase.purpose: Check if WRT throws an exception when the request is a null request.

testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a response when the request is a [HTTP] POST request.

testcase.purpose: Check if WRT returns a [HTTP] 501 Not Implemented response when the request is a synchronous [HTTP] POST request.
